response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $15,000 by potential buyers like yourself. Considering its immense worth, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $12,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to the growth of your enterprise. Should you require any further information or wish to proceed with the purchase, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12000}
